name: @whirlwind/core
description: A programming language for clever computing.

scripts.build.ls.debug: echo -e '\033[34mGenerating Language Server Binary in Debug Mode...\033[0m' && cd source/server && cargo build
scripts.build.ls.release: echo -e '\033[34mGenerating Language Server Binary in Release Mode...\033[0m' && cd source/server && cargo build --release
scripts.build.cli.debug: echo -e '\033[34mGenerating CLI Binary in Debug Mode...\033[0m' && cd source/cli && cargo build
scripts.build.cli.release: echo -e '\033[34mGenerating CLI Binary in Release Mode...\033[0m' && cd source/cli && cargo build --release
scripts.cli.example: echo 'Running CLI example...' && cd source/cli && cargo run check ../../examples/hello-world/source/main.wrl --CORELIBPATH=../library/core/core.wrl
scripts.herald.node: echo 'Running Herald in Node.js...' && cd source/herald && node source/mod.mjs
scripts.herald.deno: echo 'Running Herald in Deno...' && cd source/herald && deno run --allow-read source/mod.mjs
scripts.herald.bun: echo 'Running Herald in Bun...' && cd source/herald && bun run source/mod.mjs
